meanings.definition: Eugenias (noun): A genus of flowering plants in the myrtle family.
meanings.sent1: The eugenias in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: Botanists study different species of eugenias.
meanings.sent3: The eugenias whispered secrets to the roses in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening was as deep-rooted as the eugenias in the soil.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the eugenias filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: Eugenias (adjective): Relating to or characteristic of the genus Eugenias.
meanings.sent1: She admired the eugenias leaves for their vibrant green color.
meanings.sent2: The eugenias flowers added a touch of elegance to the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The eugenias tree stood proudly among the other plants.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as colorful as a bouquet of eugenias.
meanings.sent5: The eugenias aroma filled the room with a pleasant scent.
